Function: PF1: Design a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 1.4 The demonstrator must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a formal model (WP2.2: 4_Modelling)
Criterion: PF 1.4.4 The demonstrator must allow the validation of the models by the users, manufacturers and makers (WP2.2: 4_2_2 Validate with the users, manufacturers and makers)

Function: PF1: Design a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 1.5 The demonstrator must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element (WP2.2: 5_Prototyping)
Criterion: PF 1.5.2 The demonstrator must allow to get the prototype of the favoured solution (WP2.2: 5_1_2 Launch the prototype elaboration)

Function: PF1: Design a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 1.5 The demonstrator must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element (WP2.2: 5_Prototyping)
Criterion: PF 1.5.3 The demonstrator must allow an evaluation of the prototype functioning (WP2.2: 5_2_1 Assess the resulting prototype)

Function: PF1: Design a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 1.5 The demonstrator must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element (WP2.2: 5_Prototyping)
Criterion: PF 1.5.4 The demonstrator must allow improve the prototype (WP2.2: 5_2_2 Determine corrective actions)

Function: PF1: Design a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF1.6 The demonstrator must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization (WP 2.2: 6_Validate and launch)
Criterion: PF 1.6.9 The demonstrator must allow the transfer of the customized production order to the suitable manufacturer (WP2.2: 6_4_2 Transmit the production order)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.1 The demonstrator must inform a stakeholder of the production launch of a product (WP2.2: 7_Order Reception Process)
Criterion: PF 3.1.2 The demonstrator must allow to validate that the manufacturing order is adapted to the activities carried out by the company (WP2.2: 7_2 Check the conformity of the order)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.2 The demonstrator must plan and start production (WP2.2: 8_Production management process)
Criterion: PF3.2.1 The demonstrator must organise production considering product flows, deadlines and supplies (WP2.2: 8_1 Plan the production)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.2 The demonstrator must plan and start production (WP2.2: 8_Production management process)
Criterion: PF3.2.3 The demonstrator must define the production process (WP2.2: 8_3 Define the modality of the product industrialization)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.2 The demonstrator must plan and start production (WP2.2: 8_Production management process)
Criterion: PF3.2.5 The demonstrator must allow to fit the product specification with industrialization process requirements (WP2.2: 8_5 Provide a technical assistance)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.3 The demonstrator must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product (WP2.2: 9_Purchase)
Criterion: PF3.3.1 The demonstrator must allow to estimate the quantity of products, components, raw materials or packaging to purchase (WP2.2: 9_1 Define supply needs)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.3 The demonstrator must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product (WP2.2: 9_Purchase)
Criterion: PF3.3.2 The demonstrator must allow to find suppliers able to provide components, raw materials or packaging according to the specifications (WP2.2: 9_2 Identify suppliers)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.3 The demonstrator must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product (WP2.2: 9_Purchase)
Criterion: PF3.3.5 The demonstrator must allow receipt of proposals from suppliers (WP2.2: 9_5 Analyse the answer to the call for tenders)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.3 The demonstrator must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product (WP2.2: 9_Purchase)
Criterion: PF3.3.8 The demonstrator must validate the order launch according to the established specification and the contract (WP2.2: 9_8 Trigger the order)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF 3.3 The demonstrator must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product (WP2.2: 9_Purchase)
Criterion: PF3.3.9 The demonstrator must allow the traceability of the order (WP2.2: 9_9 Track and monitor the order)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.1 The demonstrator must validate that the specification fits with the manufacturing process (WP2.2: 10_1 Check the feasibility of the specification)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.2 The demonstrator must allow to fit the product specification with industrialization process requirements (WP2.2: 10_2 Provide a technical assistance)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.3 The demonstrator must allow to choose the suitable manufacturing and assembly operations from the instructions (drawings, bill of material...) (WP2.2: 10_3 Identify the manufacturing operations)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.4 The demonstrator must define the suitable amount of quantity or raw materials (WP2.2: 10_4 Select materials and components for manufacturing)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF 3.4.5 The demonstrator must prepare the quantity of materials required for the manufacturing (WP2.2: 10_5 Build up the stock of raw materials and components)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.6 The demonstrator must lead to the desired product (WP2.2: 10_6 Manufacture the product/component)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.7 The demonstrator must refine the product obtained (WP2.2: 10_7 Carry out the finishes of a work)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.4 The demonstrator must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material (WP2.2: 10_Manufacturing)
Criterion: PF3.4.8 The demonstrator must validate that the product perfectly fit with the specification (WP2.2: 10_8 Check the stability and the dimension of the product)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.9 The demonstrator must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements (WP2.2: 15_Order preparation process)
Criterion: PF3.9.1 The demonstrator must extract raw material according to the order preparation instructions (quantity, type…) (WP2.2: 15_1 Pick materials)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.9 The demonstrator must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements (WP2.2: 15_Order preparation process)
Criterion: PF3.9.2 The demonstrator must characterize the movement of the package from one location to another in a same place. (WP2.2: 15_2 Ship the package)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.9 The demonstrator must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements (WP2.2: 15_Order preparation process)
Criterion: PF3.9.3 The demonstrator must allow the transfer of a product/component from one place to another (WP2.2: 15_3 Transport goods to the shipping areas)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.10 The demonstrator must combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product (WP2.2: 16_Assembly process)
Criterion: PF3.10.1 The demonstrator must describe the different assembly steps from the production instruction (WP2.2: 16_1 Identify assembly operations)

Function: PF3: Produce a customized product for users with the help of other specialized stakeholders
Sub-function: PF3.10 The demonstrator must combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product (WP2.2: 16_Assembly process)
Criterion: PF3.10.2 The demonstrator must allow each part of the assembly to be positioned prior to attachment (WP2.2: 16_2 Position the part preliminary)

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF 4.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive the production order from the platform
Criterion: PF4.1.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive the specifications of the product/component to be manufactured

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF 4.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive the production order from the platform
Criterion: PF4.1.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive information about the order (quantity, delay...)

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF 4.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive the production order from the platform
Criterion: PF4.1.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must receive information about product/component deliveries

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform
Criterion: PF4.2.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform according to their specialities (skills, technologies, processes, etc.).

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform
Criterion: PF4.2.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform according to their location.

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform
Criterion: PF4.2.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must carry out the tasks allocated by the platform according to their production capacity

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the others stakeholders involved in the product manufacture through the platform
Criterion: PF4.3.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must communicate about their needs in materials or components

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the others stakeholders involved in the product manufacture through the platform
Criterion: PF4.3.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must communicate about their production progress

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the others stakeholders involved in the product manufacture through the platform
Criterion: PF4.3.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must share their sustainable practices

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.4 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the users through the platform
Criterion: PF4.4.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must communicate any change in the product specification

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.4 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the users through the platform
Criterion: PF4.4.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must communicate about their production progress

Function: PF4: Produce in network with other stakeholders using the platform
Sub-function: PF4.4 The facilities of the demonstrator must exchange with the users through the platform
Criterion: PF4.4.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must communicate about deliveries and delays

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.1 The demonstrator should facilitate product customization
Criterion: PF5.1.1The demonstrator must identify the possibilities of customization according to the chosen raw materials.

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.1 The demonstrator should facilitate product customization
Criterion: PF5.1.2 The demonstrator must identify the possibilities of customization according to the preferred technologies.

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.3 The demonstrator must support users in the recycling and repair of their products.
Criterion: PF5.3.1The demonstrator must provide information on the recyclability and repairability of the product's parts.

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.3 The demonstrator must support users in the recycling and repair of their products.
Criterion: PF5.3.2 The demonstrator must identify the stakeholders involved in recycling and repair on the territory.

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.4 The demonstrator must mobilize experts to meet customer requirements.
Criterion: PF5.4.1 The demonstrator must identify the expertise required to support users

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.4 The demonstrator must mobilize experts to meet customer requirements.
Criterion: PF5.4.2 The demonstrator must know the skills of the experts.

Function: PF5: Provide services to users through the platform
Sub-function: PF5.4 The demonstrator must mobilize experts to meet customer requirements.
Criterion: PF5.4.3 The demonstrator must inform of a need for support by the appropriate experts.

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform
Sub-function: SF1.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must share the basic data of its production system.
Criterion: SF1.1.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform of its means of production

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform
Sub-function: SF1.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must share activity data.
Criterion: SF1.2.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform of its customer orders

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform
Sub-function: SF1.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must share activity data.
Criterion: SF1.2.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform of its production capabilities

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform

Criterion: SF1.2.4 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform of its deadlines

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform
Sub-function: SF1.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must share general data
Criterion: SF1.3.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform about their localisation

Function: SF1: Provide manufacturing data (means of production, production capacity, location, delays…) to the platform
Sub-function: SF1.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must share general data
Criterion: SF1.3.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must inform about financial cost of their activities

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must identify and formalize environmental practices
Criterion: SF2.1.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must identify and formalize their eco-design practices for their products and packaging.

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must identify and formalize environmental practices
Criterion: SF2.1.4 The facilities of the demonstrator should identify and formalize their waste sorting and recycling practices.

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must share environmental practices (concrete actions)
Criterion: SF2.2.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must share their eco-design practices for their products and packaging.

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.2 The facilities of the demonstrator must share environmental practices (concrete actions)
Criterion: SF2.2.4 The facilities of the demonstrator should share their waste sorting and recycling practices.

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must share environmental initiatives (in progress project)
Criterion: SF2.3.1 The facilities of the demonstrator must share their eco-design initiatives for their products and packaging.

Function: SF2: Share environmental practices to the other stakeholders
Sub-function: SF2.3 The facilities of the demonstrator must share environmental initiatives (in progress project)
Criterion: SF2.3.4 The facilities of the demonstrator should share their waste sorting and recycling initiatives.

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.1 The demonstrator must inform about the industrial feasibility of the solution.
Criterion: SF3.1.1 The demonstrator must be aware of the technical constraints of the technologies

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.2 The demonstrator must provide technical expertise on the materials and technologies being considered.
Criterion: SF3.2.1 The demonstrator must propose technical solutions that can be achieved by its technologies

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.2 The demonstrator must provide technical expertise on the materials and technologies being considered.
Criterion: SF3.2.2 The demonstrator must advise the user on materials suitable for his chosen technology and their requirements

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.3 The demonstrator must inform about the recyclability of the product.
Criterion: SF3.3.1 The demonstrator shall inform users of the conditions for recycling parts of the product.

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.4 The demonstrator must inform about the environmental impact of the product.
Criterion: SF3.4.1 The demonstrator must assess the environmental impact of the product

Function: SF3: Share manufacturing data for design to the users
Sub-function: SF3.5 The demonstrator must inform about the possibilities of customisation
Criterion: SF3.5.1 The demonstrator must identify their customization solutions

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.1: Demonstrator facilities must participate in local economic dynamics
Criterion: SF4.1.1 Demonstrator facilities should strengthen and enhance employment potential (job creation and emergence of new trades)

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.1: Demonstrator facilities must participate in local economic dynamics
Criterion: SF4.1.2 Demonstrator facilities shall support human capital development

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.2: Demonstrator facilities should enhance environmental efficiency and resilience
Criterion: SF4.2.1 Demonstrator facilities shall implement the principles and strategies of circular economy

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.2: Demonstrator facilities should enhance environmental efficiency and resilience
Criterion: SF4.2.3 Demonstrator facilities must promote responsible production and consumption processes

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.2: Demonstrator facilities should enhance environmental efficiency and resilience
Criterion: SF4.2.4 Demonstrator facilities should reduce greenhouse gas emissions and anticipate the effects of climate change

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.4 Demonstrator facilities should contribute to social welfare and risk prevention
Criterion: SF4.4.3 Demonstrator facilities should promote a health-promoting attitude and prevent and risks

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.5: Demonstrator facilities should participate in the creation of stakeholder networks
Criterion: SF4.5.1 Demonstrator facilities should develop synergies with local stakeholders

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.5: Demonstrator facilities should participate in the creation of stakeholder networks
Criterion: SF4.5.2 Demonstrator facilities should participate in the development of new forms of collaboration with local stakeholders

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.5: Demonstrator facilities should participate in the creation of stakeholder networks
Criterion: SF4.5.3 The demonstrator’s facilities must contribute to the implementation of shared management around collective projects

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.5: Demonstrator facilities should participate in the creation of stakeholder networks
Criterion: SF4.5.4 The demonstrator facilities should strengthen the connection with the surrounding territories

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.6: Demonstrator facilities should contribute to the attractiveness of the territory
Criterion: SF4.6.1 The demonstrator’s facilities should enhance the technological and scientific visibility of the territory

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.6: Demonstrator facilities should contribute to the attractiveness of the territory
Criterion: SF4.6.2 Demonstrator facilities must promote the attractiveness of skilled workers

Function: SF4: Insert into the territory
Sub-function: SF4.6: Demonstrator facilities should contribute to the attractiveness of the territory
Criterion: SF4.6.3 Demonstrator facilities should be a territorial marketing asset

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.1 The demonstrator must implement a recycling strategy.
Criterion: CF1.1.1 The demonstrator must seek to increase the life cycle of materials considered as waste.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.1 The demonstrator must implement a recycling strategy.
Criterion: CF1.1.2 The demonstrator must be aware of the environmental impact of the collection, sorting, storage and treatment of its waste.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.1 The demonstrator must implement a recycling strategy.
Criterion: CF1.1.3 The demonstrator must choose recycling technologies that preserve the mechanical properties of the materials.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.1 The demonstrator must implement a recycling strategy.
Criterion: CF1.1.4 The demonstrator must be aware of the technological and organizational limits of the recycling system for its materials.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.1 The demonstrator must implement a recycling strategy.
Criterion: CF1.1.5 The demonstrator must inform about the recyclable parts of its products and the associated recycling chains.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.2 The demonstrator must eco-design its products
Criterion: CF1.2.1 The demonstrator must consider the entire life cycle of the product.

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.2 The demonstrator must eco-design its products
Criterion: CF1.2.2 The demonstrator must consider the choice of materials

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.2 The demonstrator must eco-design its products
Criterion: CF1.2.3 The demonstrator must minimize the consumption of materials and energy

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.2 The demonstrator must eco-design its products
Criterion: CF1.2.5 The demonstrator must consider the choice of processes

Function: CF1: Adjust to the pillars of the circular economy
Sub-function: CF1.3 The demonstrator must favour sustainable purchases and responsible consumption.
Criterion: CF1.3.3 The demonstrator must inform users of the environmental impacts of the product.
